00005 from PyQt4.QtGui import *

00008 class ViewerWindow(QMainWindow):
00009     def __init__(self, parent=None):
00010         super(ViewerWindow, self).__init__(parent)
00011         self.ui = ui_viewer.Ui_MainWindow()
00012         self.ui.setupUi(self)
00013         self.timer = QTimer(self)
00014         self.connect(self.timer, SIGNAL("timeout()"), self.update)
00015         self.image = QImage()
00016         self.time = 0
00017         self.lpos = 0
00018         self.paused = False
00019         self.interval = 100
00020         self.ui.scrollArea.setWidget(self.ui.imageLabel)
00021         #self.ui.scrollArea.setWidgetResizable(True)
00022         self.connect(self.ui.browseButton, SIGNAL("clicked()"), self.browse)
00023         self.connect(self.ui.playButton, SIGNAL("clicked()"), self.play)
00024         self.connect(self.ui.stopButton, SIGNAL("clicked()"), self.stop)

00026     def update(self):
00027         # center on pos
00028         self.time += self.interval
00029         pos = int(self.time/self.len*self.image.width())
00030         if pos > self.image.width():
00031             pos = 0
00032             self.stop()
00033         self.ui.imageLabel.cursor = pos
00034         #print "---"
00035         #print "cas:", self.time/1000.0, "s", "/", self.len/1000.0
00036         #print "pozice:", pos, "/", self.image.width()
00037         self.ui.progress.setValue(self.time)
00038         self.ui.imageLabel.update()
00039         if self.ui.centeredCheck.isChecked():
00040             margin = self.ui.scrollArea.width()//2-10
00041             self.ui.scrollArea.ensureVisible(pos,self.image.height()//2, margin)
00042         else:
00043             width = self.ui.scrollArea.width()
00044             margin = 3*width/4.0
00045             if pos - self.lpos > margin:
00046                 self.ui.scrollArea.ensureVisible(pos+margin,
00047                         self.image.height()//2, width-margin)
00048                 self.lpos = pos
00049 
00050     def browse(self):
00051         filename = QFileDialog.getOpenFileName(self, "Choose spectrogram",
00052                 ".", "Images (*.png *.jpg *.bmp *.xpm);;All files (*.*)")
00053         if not filename:
00054             return
00055         self.ui.pathEdit.setText(filename)
00056         self.image = QImage(filename)
00057         if self.image.isNull():
00058             QMessageBox.information(self, "error", "Couldn't read that file")
00059             return
00060         self.ui.imageLabel.setPixmap(QPixmap.fromImage(self.image))
00061         self.ui.imageLabel.adjustSize()
00062 
00063     def play(self):
00064         if self.paused:
00065             self.timer.start(self.interval)
00066             self.paused = False
00067             return
00068         if self.timer.isActive():
00069             self.timer.stop()
00070             self.paused = True
00071             return
00072 
00073         if self.image.isNull():
00074             return
00075         cmd = str(self.ui.commandEdit.text())
00076         if self.ui.commandCheck.isChecked() and str:
00077             os.system(cmd)
00078         #for i in xrange(0,5):
00079         #    print i
00080         #    time.sleep(1)
00081         pps = self.ui.ppsSpin.value()
00082         self.interval = 40
00083         self.len = self.image.width()*1000.0/pps
00084         self.ui.progress.setMaximum(int(self.len))
00085         if not self.timer.isActive():
00086             self.timer.start(self.interval)
00087 
00088     def stop(self):
00089         self.timer.stop()
00090         self.time = 0
00091         self.paused = False
00092
